thread.title: Nation Of Drug Addicts Confused AF After Donald Trump Says That Drugs Are Cheaper Than Candy Bars
thread.title_full: Nation Of Drug Addicts Confused AF After Donald Trump Says That Drugs Are Cheaper Than Candy Bars

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Nation Of Drug Addicts Confused AF After Donald Trump Says That Drugs Are Cheaper Than Candy Bars
text:
— CNN (@CNN) February 16, 2017 
There’s no doubt that America has a drug problem — Just turn on almost any episode of HBO’s VICE or watch a VICELAND show or go visit VICE.com , where you can find stories like this on the first couple pages: 
See a theme here? People like to get fucked up. America has a drug epidemic problem. It’s no bueno. 
That said, Donald Trump threw out the ultimate hyperbolic statement during his deranged hour-and-change press conference, claiming that “drugs are cheaper than candy bars.” 
Not sure The Donald knows just how cheap candy bars are ($1.50 for a Milky Way). And, naturally, Twitter pounced on this statement, quickly making fun of Trump. Here are a handful of the reactions, as curated by UPROXX : Share This
